text.content:
Decision Paralysis

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn.

Melee

Torn Tendon

Until healed, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}.

Ranged

Stinging Failure

Until healed, you take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls made with this attack until healed]{-2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls made with this attack until healed}.

Unarmed

Cursed

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Doomed]{Doomed 1}.

Spell
